authors.author: Eliza E. Hewitt John R. Sweney

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: More, more about Jesus; newline More, more about Jesus; newline More of His saving fullness see, newline More of His love who died for me.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: More about Jesus would I know, newline More of His grace to others show; newline More of His saving fullness see, newline More of His love who died for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: More about Jesus let me learn, newline More of His holy will discern; newline Spirit of God, my teacher be, newline Showing the things of Christ to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: More about Jesus in His word, newline Holding communion with my Lord, newline Hearing His voice in every line, newline Making each faithful saying mine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: More about Jesus on His throne, newline Riches in glory all His own; newline More of His kingdom's sure increase; newline More of His coming, Prince of Peace.
